greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Solution to a(1) = 1 and Sum_y Product_i a(y_i) = 0 for each n > 1, where the sum is over all relatively prime or monic partitions of n.
comment: A relatively prime or monic partition of n is an integer partition of n that is either of length 1 (monic) or whose parts have no common divisor other than 1 (relatively prime).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Apr 15 2018
